content.raw: So given that this is on hold - how will you go around this issue for the VRC? If objects have improper lighting / strongly dependent on object angle then that's a pretty bad thing. And this is not an issue of third party models, current VRC models are also affected by this, most notably the polaris ranger.
content.html: So given that this is on hold - how will you go around this issue for the VRC? If objects have improper lighting / strongly dependent on object angle then that's a pretty bad thing. And this is not an issue of third party models, current VRC models are also affected by this, most notably the polaris ranger.
